 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּב‎</span> **noun masculine** 

**1.** ==haft, hilt of sword== [[Judg.3.22|Judg 3:22]] (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***handle of knife***, 'in which the <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [i.e. the shank] is set' [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2800</sup>). 

**2.** ==prefect, deputy==, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span> 

**Niph\`al 3.**
